title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 57-2.4 - Application for approval of provider
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 57-2.4 - Application for approval of provider

State Regulations
(a) Providers seeking approval pursuant to
this Subpart shall submit to the commissioner an application on forms
prescribed by the commissioner and a fee of $600 for the review of such
providers. (b) The commissioner
shall review the information contained in such application and may request and
review additional information and may conduct a site visit to ensure compliance
with the requirements of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
57-2.4

Amended

New

York State Register December 24, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 52, eff. 12/24/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
